---
name: Pre-Modified Device Request
about: Request access to a pre-jailbroken device for software contribution
title: '[DEVICE REQUEST] Interest in contributing without hardware modification'
labels: community, help-wanted
assignees: ''
---

## About This Template

This issue template is for people who:

- Want to contribute to the server/protocol development
- Are not comfortable performing the JTAG hardware modification themselves
- Are hoping someone in the community might be able to provide a pre-modified device

**Please read [Contributing Without Hardware Modification](https://muurk.github.io/smartap/contributing/help-without-hardware/) before submitting.**

---

## ⚠️ Important Privacy Notice

**Do NOT share:**
- Your real name
- Email address
- Physical address
- Phone number
- Any other personal information

Keep this issue public and anonymous. If someone can help, they'll respond here and you can arrange logistics privately.

---

**Have you read through the server source code?**

**Have you read the protocol documentation?**

**What specific area do you think you could help with?**
